knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r }
mydata = head(read.csv(file="C:/Users/andy/Documents/CS+X/CS_X/week_3/hw_3/vocabulary.csv"),180)  # read csv file 
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r chart1}
theme_set(theme_classic())
gg = ggplot(data=mydata, aes(x=Vertical1))+
  geom_bar()+
  labs(x="catagories", 
       title="Videos catagory counts")
plot(gg)
```
```{r chart2}
theme_set(theme_classic())
gg = ggplot(data=mydata, aes(x=as.numeric(Index),y=TrainVideoCount),color=Vertical1)+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(color = "red",size = 3)+
  labs(x="catagories", y="videocount"
       title="Videos catagory counts")
plot(gg)
```
```{r chart}
theme_set(theme_classic())
gg = ggplot(data=mydata, aes(x=as.numeric(Index),y=log(TrainVideoCount)),color=Vertical1)+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(color = "red",size = 3)+
  labs(x="catagories",y="videocount in log" 
       title="Videos catagory counts")
plot(gg)
```
